title: Profit-max firm hires workers until MFC equals MRP

content.question: A profit-maximizing firm will continue to hire workers until the

choices.label: marginal factor cost of labor is equal to the marginal revenue product of labor
marginal factor cost of labor is equal to the price of the good produced using labor
marginal product of labor is equal to the marginal revenue product of labor
marginal product of labor is equal to the marginal factor cost of labor
marginal product of labor is equal to the price of labor

content.answer: marginal factor cost of labor is equal to the marginal revenue product of labor
